lines.text:
[referring to Mary and Mrs. Amelia Tilford]
The wicked very young... and the wicked very old.
Yours, your very own. To live with the rest of your life. There won't be a move she makes or a thing she says that won't frighten you.
Yes. And that will be my punishment.
When three people come to you with their lives spread out on a table for you to cut to pieces, then the only honest thing for you to do is to give them a chance to come out whole.
